subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] The rest of the ding file
author: Lisby
full_text:
I clearly hear the voice, Frank. No chance you're using Asian porn as  
a sound source, huh? ;)

Ann

On Oct 15, 2007, at 2:38 PM, Tracy wrote:

> I just got the chance to listen to it Frank!  The first part I  
> didn't hear too clear, but the 'make a fuckin ding" that was CLEAR  
> as a bell and you're right, that isn't something they would play on  
> the radio.  The rest of it I could hear clear too, I just had a  
> hard time hearing the very first part, but that one part was so   
> clear I was like wow wow!
>
> Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>
>
>  Same old story, get a voice that should be extra-ordinary, and not  
> one friggin' comment. I was wondering over the weekend if I've  
> spent enough time on this. The boxes produce little that anyone  
> seems to hear, and if it's too clear, I'm sure some, or maybe many  
> don't believe it. I guess it has to be that whispery s--- that you  
> have to filter into oblivion to be a "true" EVP, and I think that's  
> what most are listening for, it has to fit the paradigm of current  
> ghost hunting knowledge, or it's rejected. I've reached a point  
> where I'm tired of working on something that seems so pointless.  
> What if what I hear think I hear is only my own mis-perceptions!?
>
>  Frank-S
>
>
> Boo! Scare away worms, viruses and so much more! Try Windows Live  
> OneCare! Try now!
>
>
>
